test.name: CT (Positivo) Validar criação de conta de usuário

kw.name: Dado que acesso a URL do site
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Press Keys
kw.doc: Simulates the user pressing key(s) to an element or on the active browser.
kw.msg: Pressing special key TAB to browser.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Então valido mensagem de cadastro com sucesso
Handle Alert
kw.doc: Handles the current alert and returns its message.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.
